column4: hi anyone up to helping me install ubuntu? i'm fairly new to all this
are you installing as a single boot, or you planning to do a multiboot?
multiboot with vista x64 already on
ah heh, that's a more complicated case. have you searched the google for ubuntu dual boot install howtos?
sorry, yes i've checked google n stuff - i'm getting an error when i try and start - kernel panic
didn't get any pms from you...
verify the iso checksum ? verify the cd burn (there's an option for that) ?
its an official cd, just opened, never used
ah. hmm... is it a feisty or a dapper?
ah, well, you could try getting v7.04, and see if that meets with more success?
kk, i'll dl and try later
